```{r}
#load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
```

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
wcoa4 <- read_excel("~/NOAA Work/West Coast/WCOA-4/W01_WCOA2007R_djg_v2.xlsx")

wcoa4 <- wcoa4 %>% 
  mutate(date = dmy(str_glue("{DAY_UTC}, {MONTH_UTC}, {YEAR_UTC}"))) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  rename(stnnbr = station_id, ctdprs = ctdpressure_dbar, oxygen = oxygen_umol_kg, latitude = latitude_decimal, longitude = longitude_decimal, 
         ctdoxy = ctdoxygen_umol_kg, ctdtmp = ctdtemp_its90_deg_c, ctdsal = salinity_pss78) %>% 
  filter(oxygen > 0 | ctdoxy > 0) %>%
  filter(oxygen_flag == 1 | oxygen_flag == 2 | oxygen_flag == 6) %>%
  mutate(oxygen = if_else(oxygen < 0, NA, oxygen)) %>% 
  mutate(ctdoxy = if_else(ctdoxy < 0, NA, ctdoxy)) %>%
  select(stnnbr, oxygen, ctdoxy, latitude, longitude, ctdtmp, ctdsal, ctdprs, date) %>% 
  mutate(cruise = rep("WCOA4", n())) %>%
  mutate(across(1:8, as.numeric))

write_csv(wcoa4, "~/NOAA Work/West Coast/WCOA-4/WCOA-4-CLEAN.csv")
```

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
wcoa4 %>% 
  group_by(stnnbr) %>% 
  count(n())
```

```{r}
prof1 <- wcoa4 %>% 
  filter(stnnbr == 2) 
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_smooth(data = prof1, aes(x = oxygen, y = ctdprs), orientation = "y") +
  geom_smooth(data = prof1, aes(x = ctdoxy, y = ctdprs), orientation = "y", color = "red") +
  scale_y_reverse() +
  xlim(0, 300) + 
  labs(y = "depth (m)", x = "oxygen (umol/kg)")
```                                                                 

```{r}
prof1 %>%
  drop_na() %>% 
    mutate(oxychange = abs(oxygen - lag(oxygen, n = 1))) %>% 
    mutate(depthchange = abs(ctdprs - lag(ctdprs, n = 1))) %>% 
    mutate(ROC = round(oxychange/depthchange, 3)) %>% 
    select(ctdprs, ROC, oxygen)
```
